name: Step By Step Hero
description:
A Walking Simulator Adventure in a randomized world where every step counts!

- Mind your steps! Your steps decrease as you go: make sure you grab stepping flowers and other items so you don't run out!

- Explore the world of Omrand made of five distinct biomes!

- Increase your Heart Points to defeat evil creatures and face your ultimate foe: the Heart of the Corruption!

- Meet friendly NPCs that can help you on your travels!

- Gather Coins to buy items and various things!

- Discover secrets and take on side quests!
